snippet: The arrangement expands on an existing content-sharing relationship between the two sites and will include co-productions of online video shows.
abstract: CNBC is to announce a new partnership with Yahoo Finance in an effort to improve its standing among business news Web sites; arrangement replaces and broadens a content-sharing relationship between the sites.
lead_paragraph: The arrangement expands on an existing content-sharing relationship between the two sites and will include co-productions of online video shows.

headline.seo: CNBC and Yahoo Finance Expand Partnership to Online Video
headline.main: To Bolster Web Reach, CNBC Joins With Yahoo
headline.print_headline: To Bolster Web Reach, CNBC Joins With Yahoo
